entries.name: new(obj)
entries.desc: Pass in the obj to delegate method calls to.  All methods supported by obj will be delegated to.

entries.name: raise
entries.desc: Use #__raise__ if your Delegator does not have a object to delegate the raise method call.

entries.name: respond_to_missing?(m, include_private)
entries.desc: Checks for a method provided by this the delegate object by forwarding the call through _getobj_.
